ZoomIn.short_help: Increases the scale (zoom) of the view

ZoomOut.short_help: Decreases the scale (zoom) of the view

usage: boolean :Paste(number desttime, object spline1, [object spline2...], [table points])
Paste.short_help: Paste points to given splines at given time from the Clipboard

GetClipboard.short_help: Retrieves the tool(s) on the clipboard, as tables and as ASCII text.

DeleteGuides.short_help: Deletes guides between start and end

GetGuides.short_help: Returns a table of snapguide times & names

GoNextKeyTime.short_help: Jumps to next key frame of the active spline

GoPrevKeyTime.short_help: Jumps to previous key frame of the active spline

usage: :ZoomRectangle(number x1, number y1, number x2, number y2)
ZoomRectangle.short_help: Fill the view with the specified rectangle

ZoomFit.short_help: Changes scale to fit all displayed splines within the view
